articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Jessica Alba Stepping Down From Leadership Role at the Honest Company - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actress said building the company, which she co-founded more than 12 years ago, has been a "true labor of love."
articles.content:
Jessica Alba revealed that she is stepping down as The Honest Company’s chief creative officer.
The actress and businesswoman shared the news on Instagram Tuesday, more than a decade after she co-fo… [+1537 chars]
